name: Fragmented (itch) (Lukas Buchel)
description:
After surviving a great fall, unnamed robot searches for a way out of the dark caves back to his human. However, his power is limited and his memory shortened. His programming scattered into pieces. Robot can only perform three actions at a time. You choose which they are!

Better late than never I guess. Missed the deadline for WowieJam by a few minutes. The theme was Collaborate with AI. So I made a robot uWu

Also Unity webgl is acting up so downloadable file it is, sorry :D

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Left shift to open functions tab (drag and drop functions into slots to equip)

T to heal (when generator is filled)

R to use force or recharge at stations

Mouse LB to shoot
